name: Thanosoi
description:
Take on the infamous Tower of Thanosoi puzzle when you play THanosoiTower. It's an intriguing mathematical riddle that will have you engaged for hours. Configure the rods and disks correctly, and you'll have the puzzle solved. Don't be fooled into thinking the task will be easy -- figuring out the Tower of Thanosoi is much more challenging than it looks.

The rules of this Tower of Thanosoi game are simple, and there are only four that you have to keep in mind. Upper disks can be moved, if done one at a time, and you can put the moved disk onto any stack. However, you'll have to take size into account, as you can't put a disk on top of one that's smaller. The game comes with two versions that are equally fun for players of all ages, and it's a must play for anyone who likes math puzzles. Download THanosoiTower and put yourself to the test.
